rules_text:
{3}{R}: This creature becomes a 4/1 Phoenix Bird with flying and haste in addition to its other abilities. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each other Bird you control. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
When this creature dies, return it to its owner's hand if you are boosted. [i](Activating abilities that aren't mana abilities, putting counters, and defeating battles boosts you for the turn.)[/i]
